name: Lenco
headline: Pan-African digital bank for Africa's 50m businesses
description: Lenco is a multi-currency digital bank for businesses in Africa. With Lenco, retail outlets, hospitality businesses and startups can easily pay vendors, suppliers and perform cross-border payment while having access to growth capital.

founders.name: Andrew Airelobhegbe, Founder
founders.description: CEO & Co-founder of Lenco - pan-African digital bank for businesses

## Lenco is not a bank. We are better!
Built for Startups, Sole Traders, SMEs and Freelancers.
### Business Current Account
Real bank accounts for fast growing businesses. These accounts accept cheque, bank walk-in deposit, online bank transfer and all forms of deposits.
[Learn More](https://lenco.co/</business-current-account>)
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/businessaccount.34913f17.svg)
### Pay Bills
Create, send and manage invoices, automate payment reminders, automatic invoice reconciliation reports. Attach invoices to payments and much more.
[Learn More](https://lenco.co/</bill-payment>)
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/paybills.ad22b2c4.svg)
### Payouts
Make up to 5,000 payments instantly with no effort. Upload a file to make bulk payouts from the dashboard or integrate API to automate instant payouts.
[Learn More](https://lenco.co/</payouts>)
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/payouts.d30a4321.svg)
### Expense Management
Experience the power of automated reconciliation with transaction cartegory, receipt grouping and post transaction comments.
[Learn More](https://lenco.co/</expense-management>)
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/expensemanagment.7589cb69.svg)
## Your smart business account is backed by
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/maxtrust.c358e750.svg)
##### Maximum Trust
We host your business account in a Central bank of Nigeria licensed bank.
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/maxsec.88b98c97.svg)
##### Maximum Security
Bank grade security with two factor enabled account authentication on your account for added security.
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/maxsafe.14d2fa77.svg)
##### Maximum Safety
Your money is issued by NDIC with our licensed bank partner
### We are Free.
  * No maintenance fee.
  * No minimum balance.
  * No hidden fees.
  * Free transfers with Lenco cash back
  * Free SMS and In-app notifications.

[Get Started in 10mins](https://lenco.co/<https:/lenco.co/signup>)
![transfer banner](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/accept-payments.cd9c933e.svg)

Verify your business and personal identity

Your account is ready! Get started
Your account is ready! Get started

## A banking experience businesses love

## Take your business with you anywhere you go
**Lenco business mobile app.** Your business banking available to you on-the-go to handle everything from making and approving payments, to checking balances, seeing your business performance, sending invoices and lots more.
[![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/applestore.3c8bf564.svg)](https://lenco.co/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/lenco-banking/id1571311372>)[![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/playstore.cd7b5ac4.svg)](https://lenco.co/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details%3Fid=co.lenco>)
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/MobileDevices.eb0acebe.svg)
## Need to Speak to us?
[![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/Vector_1_slalwt.e37f363b.svg)+234 809 427 8928](https://lenco.co/<tel:+2348094278928>)[![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/Vector_2_xjwfx2.b92f7670.svg)+234 809 427 8928](https://lenco.co/<https:/wa.me/2348094278928>)![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/Vector_3_n0vfoc.7496cc67.svg)support@lenco.co
## Frequently asked questions
## What is Lenco?
Lenco is a digital only bank that issues easy to open and free to operate current bank accounts for Startups and SMEs without any hassle.
## Who can open a business account?
SMEs, startups, sole traders, and freelancers can open a business account with Lenco
We have 3 account types: **Starter** , **Pro** and **Prime** account.
**Starter** accounts was built for sole traders and freelancers without a registered business.
While **Pro** and **Prime** account are for registered business owners.
## Is there a limit to the number of accounts I can have?
Each business is eligible to have one account. You can create multiple sub-accounts to manage the different needs of your business. If you own multiple businesses, you can add a new business directly from your dashboard. This will enable you to manage all you businesses from a single dashboard by switching which business you want to manage per time.
## How much does it cost to operate a Lenco account?
Opening and operating a Lenco account is free! No transfer fees (you get cashback), No account maintenance fee, No minimum balance and more.

## Lenco is not a bank. We are better!
Built for Startups, Sole Traders, SMEs and Freelancers.
### Business Current Account
Real bank accounts for fast growing businesses. These accounts accept cheque, bank walk-in deposit, online bank transfer and all forms of deposits.
Learn More⟨4⟩
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/businessaccount.34913f17.svg)
### Pay Bills
Create, send and manage invoices, automate payment reminders, automatic invoice reconciliation reports. Attach invoices to payments and much more.
Learn More⟨7⟩
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/paybills.ad22b2c4.svg)
### Payouts
Make up to 5,000 payments instantly with no effort. Upload a file to make bulk payouts from the dashboard or integrate API to automate instant payouts.
Learn More⟨6⟩
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/payouts.d30a4321.svg)
### Expense Management
Experience the power of automated reconciliation with transaction cartegory, receipt grouping and post transaction comments.
Learn More⟨5⟩
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/expensemanagment.7589cb69.svg)
## Your smart business account is backed by
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/maxtrust.c358e750.svg)
##### Maximum Trust
We host your business account in a Central bank of Nigeria licensed bank.
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/maxsec.88b98c97.svg)
##### Maximum Security
Bank grade security with two factor enabled account authentication on your account for added security.
![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/maxsafe.14d2fa77.svg)
##### Maximum Safety
Your money is issued by NDIC with our licensed bank partner
### We are Free.
  * No maintenance fee.
  * No minimum balance.
  * No hidden fees.
  * Free transfers with Lenco cash back
  * Free SMS and In-app notifications.

## Take your business with you anywhere you go
**Lenco business mobile app.** Your business banking available to you on-the-go to handle everything from making and approving payments, to checking balances, seeing your business performance, sending invoices and lots more.

## Need to Speak to us?
![⟨26⟩+234 809 427 8928](https://lenco.co/<tel:+2348094278928>)![⟨27⟩+234 809 427 8928](https://lenco.co/<https:/wa.me/2348094278928>)![](https://lenco.co/_next/static/media/Vector_3_n0vfoc.7496cc67.svg)support@lenco.co
## Frequently asked questions
## What is Lenco?
Lenco is a digital only bank that issues easy to open and free to operate current bank accounts for Startups and SMEs without any hassle.
## Who can open a business account?
SMEs, startups, sole traders, and freelancers can open a business account with Lenco
We have 3 account types: **Starter** , **Pro** and **Prime** account.
**Starter** accounts was built for sole traders and freelancers without a registered business.
While **Pro** and **Prime** account are for registered business owners.
## Is there a limit to the number of accounts I can have?
Each business is eligible to have one account. You can create multiple sub-accounts to manage the different needs of your business. If you own multiple businesses, you can add a new business directly from your dashboard. This will enable you to manage all you businesses from a single dashboard by switching which business you want to manage per time.
## How much does it cost to operate a Lenco account?
Opening and operating a Lenco account is free! No transfer fees (you get cashback), No account maintenance fee, No minimum balance and more.

generated_description:
**Lenco: Revolutionizing Banking for Africa's Businesses**

Lenco is an innovative digital bank focused on serving the 50 million businesses across Africa. Born in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, this Lagos-based startup simplifies banking for retail outlets, hospitality businesses, and startups, providing multi-currency accounts that streamline vendor payments, supplier transactions, and cross-border payments. More than just a banking platform, Lenco serves as a vital growth capital source for its users. Check them out at [lenco.co](https://lenco.co).

### Mission Statement
Lenco’s mission is to be the go-to digital bank for African businesses that need efficient and accessible financial services.

### Key Offerings
Lenco primarily offers four main products:
1. **Business Current Account**: Fast and secure banking solutions tailored for rapidly growing businesses.
2. **Expense Management**: Tools that automate reconciliation, helping businesses manage expenses effortlessly.
3. **Payout**: Facilitates automatic payments to customers, adding convenience for business owners.
4. **Bill Payment**: A centralized platform for managing utility bills and business airtime, designed to simplify expense tracking.

### Target Markets
Lenco caters to various sectors, including:
- **Retail**
- **Startups**
- **Logistics**
- **Hospitality**
- **Developers** (through API integrations)

### Pricing Structure
What’s impressive? Lenco operates with no maintenance fees, no minimum balance requirements, and no hidden charges. Moreover, users enjoy cashback on transfers, enhancing the overall cost-effectiveness of their banking experience.

### Trust and Security
Lenco is committed to security, utilizing bank-grade measures, including two-factor authentication. The funds are managed within a Central Bank of Nigeria licensed institution, ensuring both trust and safety for their users.

### Team and Founders
With a tight-knit team of 13 employees led by visionary entrepreneurs, Lenco is spearheaded by groups like Michael Seibel from Y Combinator, who adds strategic guidance to their journey.

### Customer Testimonials
Users rave about Lenco’s intuitive interface and outstanding customer service. Many cite the app as their primary banking solution, appreciating the ease of setting up accounts and the seamless experience Lenco provides.

### Conclusion
If you're a startup or an established business in Africa looking for a banking partner that understands your needs, Lenco isn’t just another bank—they aim to be "better." They are poised to revolutionize how businesses manage their finances in the digital age, fueled by a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction. If you want to join this banking revolution, get started in just 10 minutes at [Lenco](https://lenco.co).
